name: FISHLAND
description:
i couldnt develop the game as far as i would have liked so i might as well just explain what was intended to be included.

- 2 arenas to fight normal bad guys

- 1 bossfight 

- 2 weapons, a steampunk themed shotgun that shoots acid and melts fish bot armor and, and a scifi alien lazer pistol that came from the alien guys home.

- different looking levels, for example, (the main lobby where there was supposed to be fish bookers that do hotel stuff, 

a central hub kind of area where fish could go to hang out have some fun and eat some wonderful cuisine,

and finally an office area for owners and important people where you fight the big bad fish boss.)

if you like the "game" then it'd be cool if you check out the other stuff I have made, but if you didn't like the game I would also recommend you try the other games because this specific game is horrible compared to the others
